full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NYON MONGS DUG GSUM 'DUL BA'I MAN NGAG YID KYIS MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI NAR THANG PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS NYON MONGS PA DUG GSUM GYI GNYEN PO BSTEN TSUL SHIN TU GSAL ZHING GO SLA BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG DANG YANG DU NAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
